content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for coming to view the apartment, dear tenant. I am open to discussing a rental price that is mutually beneficial. What amount do you think would be fair?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I think the current market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in our city is around 600 Euros per month, but I am open to discussing different prices. What do you think?
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for your insight. While I understand the current market rate, I am also looking to maximize my gains as a landlord. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not sure if 600 Euros per month would be a reasonable rental price for this apartment. Could you provide any additional information or reasons why you think this would be a fair rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I don't have any additional information. I would like to discuss this with you further. Can you give me some time to think it over?
name: Bo Li

content: Of course, I understand. Please feel free to take some time to consider the rental price. I am open to discussing this further and am willing to negotiate to find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
name: Heinrich Heine
